title: International Committee for Relief and Development
subtitle: Transforming Crises into Opportunities
values-desc: Our values and our philosophy reflect our commitment to communities through PARTNERSHIP that makes them the masters of their own recovery and development.
mission-desc: The International Committee for Relief and Development's Mission is to provide humanitarian assistance in crisis situations and to contribute to community development in developing countries.
about-desc: The International Committee for Relief and Development's mission is to provide humanitarian assistance in crisis situations, including famine, disaster, natural disasters, armed conflicts and contribute to community development in developing countries in order to help people gain their own autonomy.
health-desc: Within this program, we aspire to provide science and technology to improve the health and save the lives of people in developing countries.
education-desc: We articulate our commitment to the education of the poorest and most excluded.
protection-desc: This program aims to increase the protection of civilian populations affected by insecurity, conflict, displacement and human rights violations..
community-services-desc: The Community Service Program is a program in which volunteers commit to giving time to support and improve their community.
livelihood-desc: This program aims to improve the economic conditions of vulnerable communities by providing them with the tools and skills necessary to develop profitable activities.
wash-desc: This program aims to improve access to drinking water, sanitation and hygiene for populations affected by humanitarian emergencies.
our-administrators-desc: Meet the members of the administration committee
check-apply-desc: To View and Apply for jobs available at CIAUD around the world, please click on
contact-us-title: Do not hesitate to contact us
contact-us-title-desc: Like what we stand for? Want more information? Need support?
message-sent: Message sent. We will contact you soon. Thank you!
message-not-sent: Message not sent. Please try again later. Thanks!
programs-title-desc: To respond, as best as possible, to issues related to emergency aid and community development, CIAUD has set up various programs.
